feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 07:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
